name: mcp-win11-desktop
description: MCP server for full Windows 11 desktop control via OpenAI-compatible tool protocol

scripts.start:stdio: npm run build && node dist/core/server.js --transport stdio
scripts.start:http: npm run build && node dist/core/server.js --transport http
scripts.start:sse: npm run build && node dist/core/server.js --transport sse

notes: ffi-napi is intentionally omitted from package.json.
It requires native compilation on the target Windows machine.
The tools that need it (input_handler) will gracefully degrade
to PowerShell fallback if the native addon is unavailable.
